 He looked at Guiledart and then back to Cyngar. "Yes
Guiledart you stay here. I suggest one of your men
stay behind as well Cyngar to help Guiledart upgrade
our defences a little. Whenevere your ready lets go to
your base and have the final briefing then attack. If
we dont have drillbit by then im sure we can use the
Klanks missles to blast through."
